website_summaries.verdict: They are more attractive than they are comfortable – the Angel Line set is a better value.
pros: A set of two stools that adjust about 9 inches with a hydraulic mechanism
Has a swivel chrome frame with a contemporary look
cons: The seats are at an angle that can't be adjusted, and some testers commented that this curve-like design is uncomfortable

customer_reviews.title: Happy for the price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, took me 3 min to unbox/unwrap, 3 min to read instructions and set up pieces, and about 3 min to screw in screws on each chair. Total time about 15 min for complete assembly of both. 4 simple steps! & they look great, seem sturdy. Not real fancy leather. Fabric is matte, be prettier with a soft gloss, but for the price I’m happy. Terrible shipping experience with fedex, but Amazon had great customer service & that helped. All in all I’m happy for now. Hopefully they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Jeri Lanette Mendenhall

customer_reviews.title: Much better than any IKEA options
customer_reviews.text: For some reason the cheapest rotating bar stool with adjustable height offered in IKEA costs $129. So I've went looking for alternatives and ended up on this product page eventually. Having two chairs for $69 is not just a pretty good deal, it's a bargain. They are very easy to assemble, come nicely packaged and have good quality overall. We've been using them every day for two months already, and they are still represent a perfect addition to our apartment interior.
customer_reviews.author: Sergey

customer_reviews.title: small stool with easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived timely and the assembly was easy. The items appears as shown, but be aware of the dimensions. This stool feels small. We are not big people so this stool works fine for us, but I think a taller person or even someone slightly overweight may feel very snug on this stool. The stool is comfortable (if you fit properly into it), looks nice, and is priced as a bargain find, but it feels lighter and smaller than most bar stools I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Celin

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with these chairs!
customer_reviews.text: These looked plenty comfortable in the picture, but I expected them to only "look" comfortable. As with any online purchase I took a bit of a gamble. These chairs are much more comfortable than I had expected. They feel pretty sturdy, too. Not sure how long they'll last, but for this price I can't complain! My only complaint is that the base of the chair is chrome instead of black or brushed stainless... But I'll get over it.
customer_reviews.author: Trocki

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: I find these stools aesthetically pleasing but the appeal stopped there. I was hoping to be surprised, but I suppose the price should reflect the low quality. More immediately problematic, however, is that it's hard to sit up straight and I keep sliding off. The back is angled a little too far back. I'm returning them. Giving two stars for the price, since they neither wobble nor are too difficult to raise/lower. I'm additionally curious why it isn't possible to buy just one of these.
customer_reviews.author: husty

customer_reviews.title: The chairs are fantastic. Very comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: All 6 ordered arrived a week before scheduled so kudos to seller. The chairs are fantastic. Very comfortable and stylish. The assembly was very easy and using the chairs is a pleasureful experience (I know how that sounds but we are all smiles sitting in them). Update 27 Sep 2017: one of the stools leg support snapped off. I only weight 180lbs.
customer_reviews.author: MutLovrar

customer_reviews.title: These stools look sharp and are padded nicely for comfort
customer_reviews.text: These stools look sharp and are padded nicely for comfort. I have bought similar ones in the past and my experience is that the hydraulic piston fails after a year or so. I have looked for this style of bar stool of a higher quality but have not found one, so for $45 bucks each they appear to be a pretty good deal. As far as tipping over, they probably would if you leaned back with enough force but otherwise seem stable.
customer_reviews.author: zozo

customer_reviews.title: Love these chairs | Durable
customer_reviews.text: I already had a set of 4 in white for my bar. I love them so much that when my benches at my dinning table broke, I ordered these to replace them. Easy to assemble (one chair the screw hole was a little off but I managed to get it to work. Had I not, I knew they would send a replacement)
customer_reviews.author: Just Me Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, easy to set up, comfortable to sit on. Everyone loves these chairs. The are one of the most comfortable bar chairs I've ever sat on. If they could go a little lower, I'd even use one as a desk chair. I wish they had some more matching furniture pieces with the triangle design pattern.
customer_reviews.author: Vlinder

customer_reviews.title: For the $
customer_reviews.text: I maybe use these twice a week. Not sure about 3xs a day, everday, but little use and seems fine. Great if people come over and I dont feel like having them in the areas I actually inhabit.
customer_reviews.author: pen name here

customer_reviews.title: Great and adjustable
customer_reviews.text: These are actually great stools, especially for the price. You won't find many adjustable and swivel ones at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Phil M

customer_reviews.title: Definitely 5 Stars!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved these chairs! Before ordering I was worried about the back maybe being too slanted or appear as leaning back, but once putting them together, I'm so happy with them! The chair is very nice looking and comfortable to sit in! They hold up great. I definitely recommend for anyone looking for a modern, stylish, sturdy, and comfortable barstool.
customer_reviews.author: KaitlynC

customer_reviews.title: Great Price for a pair of Comfy Stools
customer_reviews.text: the air hydraulics in these types of stools often wears out in a year or so of regular use. So...if you have to replace them, get em cheap. Not only is this a great price for a pair, but they look and feel good. I will buy them again...if needed.
customer_reviews.author: David A.

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable, very easy to assemble, look expensive
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about these stools. They are extremely comfortable, classy looking, and took very little time and effort to put together. Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bar stool
customer_reviews.text: Replaced two other stools that have sat on our upper deck and provided us years of excellent seating for our great views. The adjustable and swivel seats held up well to the weather and our continuous use and they were easy to put together. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny

customer_reviews.title: Small and cute
customer_reviews.text: The seats are soft and smooth and they look great and work properly. We are both <140 lbs so they work great for us. Nobody heavier has sat on them but I would caution them to before trying.
customer_reviews.author: C. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: They work. 🤷🏼‍♀️
customer_reviews.text: These are alright stools. They get the job done but if you have a booty on the larger side of the spectrum, your hips may hang off a bit. The seat is small and the back doesn’t come up high so don’t expect much of a back rest. They aren’t the most stable feeling stools but I haven’t been scared of falling off when I’m sitting down so that’s nice. I would consider them great starter stools.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Must have for great price
customer_reviews.text: As a larger 250lbs man i can tell you these look great and hold up very well! Only wish is that the base was brushed knuckle instead of shiny chrome but awesome value!
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, comfortable for short periods of time
customer_reviews.text: These were very easy to put together and look great in my kitchen. Very happy with this purchase. I would recommend, but only if you do not plan to sit in them for long periods of time as the back is not very comfortable to sit in for very long with the odd angle it is at.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie T.

customer_reviews.title: Good stools.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good. Some scratches on leg when we opened, but overall they are good stools.
customer_reviews.author: Joline

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I love these stools! The leather is very soft and they are comfortable. I bought 2 for the kitchen nook and they look great.
customer_reviews.author: jolene

customer_reviews.title: Nice but wobbly
customer_reviews.text: Awesome stools for the price! They are still holding up after having them for about a month; but my only complaint is that the base isn't very sturdy so the stool can be a bit wobbly. We've had a couple falls but no major injuries; although the warning label it comes with is quite scary - saying the stool can cause severe injury and death!
customer_reviews.author: chromtastic

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Awesome price, feel very comfortable, and works great, only reason I did 3 stars is because it had a whole in the seat right out of the box. I dont know if it was the way it was packaged or they sent it like that. But I would recommend buying these
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Adkins

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bar stools!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely comfy and perfect for what I was looking for! You do need to be cautious about the stools tipping, but that's only if you don't sit exactly in the center of the chair which the packaging clearly warns about. Also be wary if you're a short person and you put the chair at its highest setting, it takes some adjusting and sitting on to get the chair to go back down to normal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift for a friend
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift to a friend. They are super happy with it. The chairs were very easy to assemble and are sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Avi

customer_reviews.title: We love these chairs
customer_reviews.text: We love these chairs. If I had more space at home, I'd purchase another two. The week before I purchased these online, I almost bought a pair (locally) that look exactly like these for almost double the price just for one. In other words, at a local store, they would have cost me $160 each.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OCD I guess
customer_reviews.text: Mine came in a bit defective. Due to welding not even. Although, they seem okay when sitting down on them.
customer_reviews.author: steFUNnie

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to use for our shop stools. They are extremely comfortable! Price was great. Easy to clean up. And love that they can raise and lower.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: More durable than thought
customer_reviews.text: Using them in automotive office and they have held up great so far! Hold up a bit of weight as well. The adjustment of height is very good. Can have chair height or high top height.
customer_reviews.author: Johnathan Grundon

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking quality bar stools!
customer_reviews.text: These are great bar stools! It took me no time to assemble them and the quality of the leather is very good. Not top grain leather but very good nonetheless. They are really very stylish stools. No complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: Rewster

customer_reviews.title: Nice bar stool
customer_reviews.text: Reasonable price and beautiful outlooks. The PU leather does not seem to be durable enough.
customer_reviews.author: Jovan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great love it, it looks great, so far so good, actually very comfortable, and the kids love it
customer_reviews.author: Max Smirnoff

customer_reviews.title: best stools everrrrrr
customer_reviews.text: the stools are great. i get so many compliments on them. not only do they look stylish but they are very comfortable! you can actually lean back in them to an extent unlike other bar stools. my only peave is that if youre eating greasy food and touch the chair itll leave a shiny spot where youd have to get a damp cloth to clean off. had the set for 2 months now and still in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy Semere

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality!
customer_reviews.text: The quality on these is awesome for the price! The leather is soft & the chairs are comfy. You can lean back & forward without the chair falling. We are super impressed with these.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Product is as described. Looks sharp, comfy, and stabled. I use it on my kitchen island. Very easy to assemble. Something I like most is that it is adjustable! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for what we needed. Very easy tp put together and they are sturdy and comfortable. Just make sure that you wipe them down with a wet cloth every couple days
customer_reviews.author: brandy d

customer_reviews.title: Good  quality. Great price.!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son. As a Christmas gift. He really like it. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: aydee montesinos

customer_reviews.title: Set of (2) Black Leather Modern hydraulic swivel bar stools
customer_reviews.text: These stools look great with my new home bar setup and black leather suite the dinning area perfect hydraulic constructed swivel 360 degrees
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Jonesjr

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Great deal, good durable and I love that I can clean it with a wet rag after each meal!
customer_reviews.author: CL

customer_reviews.title: Fit the bill and the bar!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for stools that would work in our retro basement. These work well and the height was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: SandiinMO

customer_reviews.title: everyone love them but me I suppose
customer_reviews.text: everyone love them but me I suppose, they are very nice looking and seem well made, but its almost like the butt part is to bit and the back part is to small and you pretty much lean back while in them. but everyone who has sat in them besides me like them
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and durable
customer_reviews.text: So easy to assemble and great quality chairs. Always sturdy and adds style to the room. Also, I like the hydraulic lever that allows the seat to go up and down.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Streicher

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable chairs with reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: The chairs are comfortable. With the large base plate, it is also stable although the base is not too heavy. Assembly is easy. By following the instructions, there is no other tools are needed.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Chair came broken
customer_reviews.text: One of my barstools came broken. It doesn’t go up and down. Chairs are okay for price but it isn’t very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Chairs
customer_reviews.text: The chairs are extremely easy to assemble, very comfortable and elegant. I will probably buy two more sets! The reason I didn't give it 5 starts is do to the LONG delivery otherwise it's a 5!!
customer_reviews.author: Damaris

customer_reviews.title: Gaming chairs
customer_reviews.text: Used in our home as gaming chairs. Super comfortable and the foot bar is nice. Easy to move around but is sturdy to sit in. Spacious and is ergonomically shaped; leaning back or sitting crossed legged is also good in this chair.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: They look amazing and SO comfortable! Came a week ahead of time too! A steal!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Look great - feels much higher quality than the price would suggest otherwise, and are very easy to build.
customer_reviews.author: David W.

customer_reviews.title: value for the money
customer_reviews.text: we used it for our. restaurant we love it alot its easy to assemble and very elegant
customer_reviews.author: manal

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and looks nice. Great for the price
customer_reviews.author: cristina s thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great Chairs
customer_reviews.text: We just purchased six of these chairs for our bar and pub style table. The chairs were easy to assemble and are quite comfortable. They also look really sharp and seem like they will hold up well (a concern for us with 4 kids aged 7 months-10). The lift function works well and the adjustable height is amazing with our kiddos. I would highly recommend these chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Gill

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: They are very modern, chic and durable. They aren’t super comfortable but they are barstools so I didn’t expect them to be anyway. The price is great for the quality of these . I would purchase again !
customer_reviews.author: jada

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly. Highly recommend if you want something more ...
customer_reviews.text: Stylish, comfy, and affordable. Easy assembly. Highly recommend if you want something more than a casual and butt-numbing barstool.
customer_reviews.author: Galaxy Swirl

customer_reviews.title: For underwear models only...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, sturdy enough for the price. Came dented and with a rip in the seat fabric. If you're not an underwear model (i.e. butt wider than 16 inches or so) you're gonna be uncomfortable. Your hamhocks won't fit between the rigid flares on either side of the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Mudfoot

customer_reviews.title: Great Chairs - Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble. Very good quality. Highly recommend. Great price to fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These were really easy to put together and fit my bar scene in ...
customer_reviews.text: These were really easy to put together and fit my bar scene in my home perfectly. They are comfortable, adjustable, and swivel nicely. They look beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Sloane

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: You need to be a small person to sit in them
customer_reviews.author: Norm G

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic set of bar stools. I love them, easy to put together and super sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Handelz

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: I love what I got for the price. They were meant to be extra stools for when my husband and I want to have people over for darts. They are perfect for what I wanted!!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Like em. Very comfy
customer_reviews.text: Look good. Comfy but hard to slip on and out of seat if you have any kind of butt on you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this barstools for my new house and I was really excited. I love the design of these barstools. The cushion is soft and comfy and the height is just perfect for my breakfast bar. When I received the item, I noticed a small tear in the seat. I was really disappointed. I sent the sellers a message and they have provided great support and even replaced the seat portion for me. I am glad I chose these barstools!
customer_reviews.author: Lakshmi Priya Srinivasan

customer_reviews.title: Super Fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Super Fast delivery. Good quality chair. Wish it is couple inches shorter so I can use them as regular lounge chair. Base is a little light weight as it might cause tip over.
customer_reviews.author: Audi Quattro

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these two bar stools for my apartment and are awesome for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Keenan Wilson

customer_reviews.title: You can NOT pass up a deal like this!
customer_reviews.text: Delivery of these were actually a WEEK EARLIER than I expected! Very easy to assemble! I love the modern/contemporary look and feel they give. When my bar setup arrives, I will post pictures!
customer_reviews.author: T.J.

customer_reviews.title: MODERN AND STYLISH, BUT.....,,
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous bar stool, modern and stylish, however will tilt over when sitting and getting up as the base is too light weight to stay firmly in place on the ground. Watch out for that with guest. I warn guest about tipping over. Otherwise it would have been a perfect barstool. I love that you can sit slightly back and not straight up. Leaning back does not cause tilting, it's only when all your weight in shifted to the front when getting on or off. I'm trying to figure out how to prevent that, but I will not return these gorgeous barstools.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect barstool chair! Great price, hood quality.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic price, super comfy. These swivel, go up and down to adjust for height, and a have a back to lean on.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my kitchen island
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect size for my kitchen island and are adjustable. They took about an hour to assemble and are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Great barstools. Seem to be holding up quite well. Def worth the price. Saw the exact same one at Ross for the same price for just one stool!

customer_reviews.title: Accidental Order
customer_reviews.text: I accidentally ordered these bar stools mistaking them for another set my husband preferred. Once we received them he could not tell the difference, these bar stools are great, very comfortable easy to clean, high quality. Everyone has complemented them and they fit perfect with our decor. I only ordered one set but will be ordering again soon!

customer_reviews.title: Nice black bar chairs
customer_reviews.text: Great chairs. They are a little wobbly but i still feel secure enough sitting on them and my toddler as well. One thing I did notice about the black is you can see alot of oil etc from fingers mostly from my 2 year old who touches the chair with his messy hands from eating. Im thinking it wouldn't be as noticeable with the other colors. Its not hard to clean off but it is a hassle because its constately showing up.

product_meta.title: Bar Stools Barstools Swivel Stool Height Adjustable Bar Chairs with Back PU Leather Swivel Bar Stool Set of 2 Kitchen Counter Stools Dining Chairs
feature_bullets: ✔【HIGH SITTING COMFORT】 Our bar stoos are made of high duty chrome, padded with foam and covered with PU leather, The counter stools are ergonomically designed: You can lean against the back of the stool and put your legs on the footrest for a better sitting position. The metal frame of our kitchen bar stools is very robust and durable.bar stools counter stools kitchen bar stools

✔【PASS SGS CERTIFICATION】 The gas lift of our bar stools are certified by SGS, allowing you to use more peace of mind.And our kitchen bar stools can adjust from 24.8-32.7 inches,seat can swivel 360 degrees.Our counter stool is your best choice.counter stools kitchen bar stools bar chairs
